com.glkwhr.snakegame

Class Apple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glkwhr.snakegame.Apple

  • public class Apple
extends java.lang.Object
    Apple class controls the behavior of the apple in the game.
    Since:
    Aug 28, 2017
    Author:
    H.W.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Point pos
      The location of the apple (It should be null if the apple has not been produced yet).
      private java.util.Random rand
      The seed used to generate new location of the apple.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Apple()
      The constructor only initializes the random seed.

    • Field Detail

      • pos

        private Point pos
        The location of the apple (It should be null if the apple has not been produced yet).

      • rand

        The seed used to generate new location of the apple.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Apple

        public Apple()
        The constructor only initializes the random seed. Use produce() to generate an apple.

    • Method Detail

      • getPos

        public Point getPos()
        The method is used to get the current location of the apple
        Returns:
        Point This returns the current location of the apple in (row, col).

      • produce

        public Point produce(GameMap map)
        The method is used to produce an apple.
        Parameters:
        map - The map on which the apple would be placed.
        Returns:
        Point This returns the location of the produced apple in (row, col).

      • consume

        public java.lang.Boolean consume(GameMap map)
        The method is used to consume the apple.
        Parameters:
        map - The map where the apple is.
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the apple in the map is consumed.
